Title: 🔥🔥🔥[ANN][BOUNTY-ICO] AIXEUS - AI + Elastic Blockchain. Banking & Trading 🔥🔥
Body: AIXEUS - World's First AI-Powered Elastic Blockchains for the SmartWeb, Banking & Trading          TEAM      Description   1. AIXEUS = AI-Neural Networks + Elastic Blockchains + Anonymized Data Transfer and -Protection for Decentralized Web 3.0, - Banking & Trading.   AIXEUS is an AI-powered Elastic Blockchain platform and OS for superfast, supersafe and anonymized data -sharing and -storing, web-browsing (SmartWeb 3.0!), banking, trading and many more.  A new powerful OS protocol and platform that makes data -sharing and -storing, banking and financial transactions much more private (anonymized), faster, cheaper and more secure (Quantum-proof) than the current mainstream platforms. It can also be used for all kinds of industries where data is critical: banking, financials marketing, social media, science, IOT, IIOT, insurance, legal and many more.  2. Dynamic Holographic Avatars for Protection of Data and Privacy. Aixeus generates unique Quantum-proof dynamic holographic avatars to protect data and the privacy of users; instead of using pseudonyms that we see on current platforms.  ProXeus will be our usercase of the SmartWeb 3.0.  3. 2-Stage Dual Token Sale: Utility and Security Tokens.     Stage 1: ICO - XAI-Utility tokens. Q1-Q2 2019.    Stage 2: STO - S-XAI Security Tokens; Q3 / Q4 2019.   Collected Tokens will be transferred to Airdrop participants' Stellar accounts and "frozen" till end of ICO. After the end of this ICO, the tokens will be released and holders are eligible to trade it on exchanges or trade it for our Security Tokens (S-XAI); stage 2.  4. Our website with Whitepaper.     Web:  https://aixeus.ai     We have a great team with lot of experience in Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain and ICO's (see website).  5. How to get Free Tokens. Instructions:  1. Create a buzz, participate and invite members in our discussion on Bitcointalk: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5094673.msg49119637 2. Join our Telegram channel Aixeus http://telegram.me/aixeus 3. Start Airdrop campaign at http://telegram.me/aixeus_bot. Follow the instructions. Start the application by typing ” /start “. 4. Invite new members to http://telegram.me/aixeus and the http://telegram.me/aixeus_bot. Create your pesonal referral code within aixeus-bot. 5. Add the sentence "Proud member of AIXEUS! Join the new Blockchain- and Internet Revolution!" at every invitation. 6. Follow AIXEUS on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AIXEUSLABS 7. Promote AIXEUS on Twitter. Add your personal referral code to your tweet. 8. Every new member will receive 200 Free XAI Tokens (approx. $75-100).     Get an extra 120 XAI for every new registered member that you referred to our Bounty platform. 9. Note: We use the Stellar platform. In order to receive our tokens you need to create a Stellar account first. 10. More information: https://aixeus.ai/icolabs/airdrops-and-bounty-campaigns/ 11. Max. participants: 10,000. 12. US Citizens are excluded from this airdrop.   6. Social Media. https://aixeus.ai http://telegram.me/aixeus_bot http://telegram.me/aixeus https://twitter.com/AIXEUSLABS https://www.linkedin.com/company/aixeuslabs https://github.com/aixeus https://plus.google.com/116461146933629850050   7. Contact: info@aixeus.ai    Join the Revolution!

Author: GalacticCommand
Title: 🔥🔥🔥[ANN][BOUNTY-ICO] AIXEUS - AI + Elastic Blockchain. Banking & Trading 🔥🔥
Body: No, actually not.  It's totally different: it's a new Elastic Blockchain protocol (compliant with strict GDPR-Law) that's powered by Artificial Intelligence.  AIXEUS is redefining the internet and financial transactions; it's going to make it more safer, more private, more secure, anonymized and even 10,000x faster.  Sophisticated Artificial Intelligence algorithms using Deep Learning Neural Networks are playing the 'hero / master', where the Blockchain itself plays the 'slave'. SmartData will be encrypted, anonymized, and distributed. The SmartData is stored in the Blockchain but only visible as unique Dynamic Avatars. This makes it almost impossible for even quantum-computers to break the code.  AIXEUS is inspired by how the brain works; it's "invented" by a medical doctor. He got the inspiration when attending a Blockchain and AI event at Stanford University , 2 yrs ago after speaking with several professors.  What public sees are unique dynamic avatars. But when users do financial transactions example P1 <=> P2;  only these P's will see the details of the transactions and data. They may also decide who can see it and with whom they want to share it.  The users have full control over all their data. Currently, giants like Facebook, Google, Twitter own all your content. They can even see what you do. And they can do whatever they want with your data. They can sell it without knowing you. They are making a lot of money with your data, and leaving you behind with empty hands.  AIXEUS is changing the game. The user is the owner of its own content. He/she decides who can see your data. They can even monetize it by sharing data (music, information, etc.) to others.  This protocol comes with another "layer" where developers can develop their own DApps to run on the new protocol. Basically, this protocol is built to serve all kind of industries: from banking, high speed financial trading, transactions, marketing, to social media, insurance, IOT, Science, etc. Industries where data is critical.  AIXEUS is a game changer.

Author: GalacticCommand
Title: 🔥🔥🔥[ANN][BOUNTY-ICO] AIXEUS - AI + Elastic Blockchain. Banking & Trading 🔥🔥
Body: Elastic Blockchain is a very flexible Blockchain that's compliant with the strict European Privacy Laws (GDPR). Our challenge was to find a solution where users may change their privacy status, the right to be forgotten, etc., without breaking the integrity of the whole blockchain. And we've found the solution. I'm not allowed to tell you the details, but it's not "burning" public keys.

Author: GalacticCommand
Title: 🔥🔥🔥[ANN][BOUNTY-ICO] AIXEUS - AI + Elastic Blockchain. Banking & Trading 🔥🔥
Body: AIXEUS + Decentralized Cloudservers = no big deal; the platform is very versatile!  AIXEUS creates for every registered user, automagically, the BlayXar Digital Wallets, Vaults and Drag-DropStorage Boxes, and these will be stored off-chain and DragDropStorage Boxes stored on our own Cloudservers.  Both configurations will have the miltary grade protections.  But we are nice... We're not only scientists, geeks, nerds, developers, professors but also businessmen. it's also possible for other Cloudservices to hook on our platform to make use of our new Quantum-proof protocol.
